kubejs.ponder.test.multi_scene_test.head: Yes rainbow sheep is cool
kubejs.ponder.test.multi_scene_test.text: This is sheep. It's boring and not rainbow!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.grass.text_1: This is dirt, contrary to popular belief it is not green
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.hoeing.text_1: You can hoe dirt and grass blocks to grow plants on them!
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.basic_usage.text_1: Blocks can be placed by right clicking another block
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.basic_usage.text_2: And fun fact: You can break it too! Who knew you can mine in MINEcraft?
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.hoeing.text_2: But without water they turn back into dirt blocks
dirtcraft.ponder.dirt.grass.text_2: However you can put grass blocks next to it to make it green
kubejs.ponder.infusion.matrix_scene.head: infusion!
kubejs.ponder.infusion.matrix_scene.text: Only add the jars of essentia you need for the infusion, or else it will not work.
After the altar is formed, you can add as many pedestals and decorations as you want.
